<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the un[[localize]]d text value of an object's side / a group's side or a side as:

* [[east]], [[opfor]] - "East" 
* [[west]], [[blufor]] - "West"
* [[resistance]], [[independent]] - "Resistance"
* [[civilian]] - "Civilian"
* [[sideUnknown]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideEnemy]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideFriendly]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideLogic]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideEmpty]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideAmbientLife]] - "Unknown" </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''WFSideText''' param </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> param: [[Object]], [[Group]] or [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - unlocalized side text value </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <Code>[[WFSideText]] [[player]];</Code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <Code>[[WFSideText]] [[group]] [[player]];</Code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <Code>[[WFSideText]] [[west]]</Code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[side]], [[localize]], [[isLocalized]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
